---
title: "Code Examples"
---

Here is a list of examples, provided by the Aptos team and the community, that demonstrate how to use various features
of the Aptos blockchain. These examples cover a range of topics, from simple Move contracts to full applications. Please
note that ones from external sources are not maintained by the Aptos team, so please use them at your own risk.

## Move Contract Examples

- [Daily Move](https://github.com/aptos-labs/daily-move) — A collection of Move contracts that demonstrate various features and patterns.

## Full App Examples

- [Move By Example](https://github.com/aptos-labs/move-by-examples) — A collection of full stack examples that are also available on [Aptos Learn](https://learn.aptoslabs.com/).
- [NFT Marketplace Example](https://github.com/aptos-labs/marketplace-example)

## Feature Specific Examples

- [Confidential Payments](https://github.com/aptos-labs/confidential-payments-example)
- [Aptos Keyless Webapp](https://github.com/aptos-labs/aptos-keyless-example)
